4. Mali: This is a country located in West Africa. It is mentioned as one of the countries whose head of state would visit Bangui.

5. Chad: This is a country located in Central Africa. It is mentioned as one of the countries whose head of state would visit Bangui.

In summary, the "Location" entities mentioned in the paragraph are Burkina Faso, Bangui, Gabon, Mali, and Chad.
